description:
My place is close to Central Park, Carl Schultz Park, Randall Island, Museum Mile and the East river. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and is very pet friendly.

Amazing location, cozy 2 bedroom, one bathroom with one queen and 3 twin beds. Sleeps 5 people. Possible 6. Eat in kitchen and only one floor walk up.

Internet, cable, laundry in the Building and perfect location

As often as you need

Great restaurants, amazing museums and parks.

Cross town bus stops right outside the entrance and 2nd avenue train is 2 blocks away.
name: 2 Bedroom on the Upper East side - Central Park
review: Bjork was a great host. She was very thoughtful from the beginning. My plane was delayed so I couldn't arrive at the time we had schedule but she found a way to bring me the keys. She asked me how I was and how was everything and she answer all my questions immediately. The place is well located in a nice zone and has lots of places to buy food and stuff you need for the apartment. It is beautiful and well equipped it even had sheets and towels. Everything is clean and organized. I will definitely recommend this place and if I have the chance to go back to New York I wouldn't doubt to stay again at Bjork's place.
